post.body: He better bring Secret Service... cuz I ain't gonna stop till manbearpig is done... then I'm gonna spray hairspray @ the sky. :)
Hey! You're alive! Wondered where ya have been. :)
Where's Manbearpig... I'm super - super - cereal... I mean, I love it - it's hot... global warming... it's cold... global warming.
I presume this is the KSTP AM 1500 crew... They still owned by Hubbard Broadcasting?
TCOT would be well warned to take the lesson...
Hey. People only voted for hope and change for POTUS. For everything else - it's the same old crap! :)
Forget that... the money isn't zero percent anymore... it's negative. You pay people to borrow money from you... :)
I don't think they're particularly good.... I don't see this President pardoning Lindh or commuting his sentence.
Well I have two girls as well... not looking forward to the dating years... :)
I'd like to see a one button click update of all plugins.....
Agreed.
Well proportional response is okay in my view... except in most cases - the "propotion" is exsistential threat denial.
Now Mom... can you honestly say you didn't try the same stuff when you were her age with your parents? :) just curious... :)
For 55 bucks a block - you might as well build it out of granite or slate ... it would cost less.
Well I for one am looking forward to a rousing speech about "the gay" & then seeing the pink parade... wooo! Fuscia and change!
That's funny. Paulson and Bernanke are playing Monopoly with the US's money. :)
Buck up. We're all about hope, change, and wealth distribution. Speakin of which, I'm a little low this month... PONY UP! :)
OK - I gotta run out... but I can't help it... "I'm so excited... I've got wood!" (fore me - Firewood that is). Who said it? (the quote)
is considering an interesting premise.... what if the US had no taxes beyond what it needed to finance its debts... and borrowed everything.
is realizing a full cord of wood is actually more wood than I anticipated....
is getting firewood delivered... woooo FIRES! :)
Find it funny that ppl care about Bill Richardson's rec. If he were a republican nominated by Bush - they'd have castrated him by now.
I am sick of hearing about Ramos & Compean. Best they can hope for is a POTUS commutation perhaps. 12 yrs for shooting a drug dealer?
RT: http://tinyurl.com/59kfjr Talked with a buddy today who's on Wall St and does debt restructure. He's not a happy guy either...
BTW - for those that are Seinfeld fans.... today is the first day of Festivus... the holiday for the rest of us... :) LOL!
British court convicts al Qaeda member of directing terrorism, first person in UK to be found guilty of the offense.
About frickin time... stupid credit card companies... http://tinyurl.com/4jyxhm
J W Lindh should not be pardoned or have his sentence commuted. He plead to avoid a needle.... So be it.
Off to workout and then to bed.... @ me or DM me... later all :)
